thread.title: Mr S Homer
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Mr S Homer

author: Mr S Homer
title: Mr S Homer
text:
Brought a coat for my dog, when it arrived it was to small, returned the coat asking for a exchange to a larger size. I didn't think the return documentation made it clear what to do. As a result I ended up writing on the ticket what to do and expected it to go wrong.
To my surprise it went without a glitch. The exchanged coat was with me within the week at no extra charge!
If the return form was slightly easier to confirm what to do, I would have give 5 stars.
